content.full_text: Check of Levi Davis to Abraham Lincoln, 22 July 18371 [Countersigned and Registered.]
paragraphs: Check of Levi Davis to Abraham Lincoln, 22 July 18371

footnotes.text:
1This partially printed check was filled in by Levi Davis and signed by Davis and Whiteside.
                  Lincoln countersigned it on the back side.
